attributes.action: Tell us why you ignored us for years but after only a few words from his own mouth you agreed that Tim Yeo should not chair the energy committee.
attributes.additional_details: Hundreds of attempts to get you to acknowledge the conflict between Tim Yeo receiving hundreds of thousands of pounds from energy companies while he chaired the Energy Select Committee were ignored.  Can you come clean on why you were not prepared to believe us over this matter but the moment he confirms that he is conflicted you shift him out.  Do you agree that this demonstrates even more that you lack even a vestige of probitive judgement?
